analysis.description:
Reentrancy in UpgradeableToken.upgrade (/unique_chucks/14/0xe895ca33788c5812119ae5f5c98a78924931f2d5.sol#577-592):
	External calls:
	- upgradeAgent.upgradeFrom(msg.sender,value) (/unique_chucks/14/0xe895ca33788c5812119ae5f5c98a78924931f2d5.sol#585-587)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalUpgraded (/unique_chucks/14/0xe895ca33788c5812119ae5f5c98a78924931f2d5.sol#590-591)

LostAndFoundToken.enableLostAndFound (/unique_chucks/14/0xe895ca33788c5812119ae5f5c98a78924931f2d5.sol#678-690) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token_contract.approve(agent,tokens) (/unique_chucks/14/0xe895ca33788c5812119ae5f5c98a78924931f2d5.sol#690)

Crowdsale.finalize (/unique_chucks/14/0xe895ca33788c5812119ae5f5c98a78924931f2d5.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(multisigWallet,unsoldTokens) (/unique_chucks/14/0xe895ca33788c5812119ae5f5c98a78924931f2d5.sol)

Crowdsale.assignTokens (/unique_chucks/14/0xe895ca33788c5812119ae5f5c98a78924931f2d5.sol#1299-1300) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(receiver,tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/14/0xe895ca33788c5812119ae5f5c98a78924931f2d5.sol#1300)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.finalize (/unique_chucks/14/0xe895ca33788c5812119ae5f5c98a78924931f2d5.sol):
	External calls:
	- token.releaseTokenTransfer() (/unique_chucks/14/0xe895ca33788c5812119ae5f5c98a78924931f2d5.sol)
	- unsoldTokens = token.balanceOf(address(this)) (/unique_chucks/14/0xe895ca33788c5812119ae5f5c98a78924931f2d5.sol)
	- token.transfer(multisigWallet,unsoldTokens) (/unique_chucks/14/0xe895ca33788c5812119ae5f5c98a78924931f2d5.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- finalized (/unique_chucks/14/0xe895ca33788c5812119ae5f5c98a78924931f2d5.sol)

Reentrancy in GenericCrowdsale.preallocate (/unique_chucks/14/0xe895ca33788c5812119ae5f5c98a78924931f2d5.sol#981-991):
	External calls:
	- tokenAmount = fullTokens.mul(10 ** uint256(token.decimals())) (/unique_chucks/14/0xe895ca33788c5812119ae5f5c98a78924931f2d5.sol#986-988)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investedAmountOf (/unique_chucks/14/0xe895ca33788c5812119ae5f5c98a78924931f2d5.sol#990-991)
	- tokenAmountOf (/unique_chucks/14/0xe895ca33788c5812119ae5f5c98a78924931f2d5.sol#990-991)
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/14/0xe895ca33788c5812119ae5f5c98a78924931f2d5.sol#990-991)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/14/0xe895ca33788c5812119ae5f5c98a78924931f2d5.sol#990-991)

GenericCrowdsale.GenericCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/14/0xe895ca33788c5812119ae5f5c98a78924931f2d5.sol#918-922) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp < start && start < end) (/unique_chucks/14/0xe895ca33788c5812119ae5f5c98a78924931f2d5.sol#920-921)

GenericCrowdsale.getState (/unique_chucks/14/0xe895ca33788c5812119ae5f5c98a78924931f2d5.sol#1100-1103) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/14/0xe895ca33788c5812119ae5f5c98a78924931f2d5.sol#1103)
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/14/0xe895ca33788c5812119ae5f5c98a78924931f2d5.sol#1102-1103)

TokenTranchePricing.TokenTranchePricing (/unique_chucks/14/0xe895ca33788c5812119ae5f5c98a78924931f2d5.sol#1201-1232) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp < start && start < end) (/unique_chucks/14/0xe895ca33788c5812119ae5f5c98a78924931f2d5.sol#1222-1223)

TokenTranchePricing.getCurrentTranche (/unique_chucks/14/0xe895ca33788c5812119ae5f5c98a78924931f2d5.sol#1236-1243) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- tranches[i].start <= block.timestamp && block.timestamp < tranches[i].end && tokensSold < tranches[i].amount (/unique_chucks/14/0xe895ca33788c5812119ae5f5c98a78924931f2d5.sol#1240-1242)

elements.expression: tranches[i].start <= block.timestamp && block.timestamp < tranches[i].end && tokensSold < tranches[i].amount

analysis.description:
Crowdsale.setStartingTime (/unique_chucks/14/0xe895ca33788c5812119ae5f5c98a78924931f2d5.sol) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(startingTime > block.timestamp && startingTime < endsAt) (/unique_chucks/14/0xe895ca33788c5812119ae5f5c98a78924931f2d5.sol)

Crowdsale.setEndingTime (/unique_chucks/14/0xe895ca33788c5812119ae5f5c98a78924931f2d5.sol) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(endingTime > block.timestamp && endingTime > startsAt) (/unique_chucks/14/0xe895ca33788c5812119ae5f5c98a78924931f2d5.sol)

CrowdsaleToken.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/14/0xe895ca33788c5812119ae5f5c98a78924931f2d5.sol#765)
CrowdsaleToken.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/14/0xe895ca33788c5812119ae5f5c98a78924931f2d5.sol#765-767)
UpgradeAgent.originalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/14/0xe895ca33788c5812119ae5f5c98a78924931f2d5.sol#499)
